items.title: User Activity Sharing
items.description: Allow users to share their workout activities with friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: User can post completed workouts to a social feed
Friends can view, like, and comment on shared activities
Privacy settings allow users to control who sees their posts
non_functional: Privacy settings must comply with data protection regulations

items.title: Friends and Followers System
items.description: Enable users to connect with others by adding friends or following profiles.
acceptance_criteria: User can search for other users by name or username
User can send and accept friend requests
User can follow others without mutual confirmation
non_functional: Search results should return within 1 second
System must handle up to 10,000 connections per user

notes: Assumed that core fitness tracking functionality exists and this epic focuses on social engagement features.
